translations: n．苏格兰威士忌：一种产自苏格兰的威士忌酒，以其独特的口感和风味而著名。
· He has a collection of fine scotches.
他收藏了一些上等的苏格兰威士忌。
v．切断，阻止：阻止某事物的发展或进展。
· The new evidence scotches the theory that he was the murderer.
新的证据驳倒了他是凶手的理论。

sentences.sentence: Two Scotches, please—and make those doubles, will you?
sentences.translation: 请来两杯苏格兰威士忌—都要双份的，好吗？

sentences.sentence: His arrival in the capital scotches report that he is dead.
sentences.translation: 他抵达首都一事止住了说他已死的传言。

sentences.sentence: I figured I could start drinking, so it was three double Scotches.
sentences.translation: 我想到自己可以开始喝酒了，于是就要了三杯双份威士忌。
